body: Would someone be able to tell me how many clicks can Minecraft register per second?
body_tagged: Would someone be able to tell me how many clicks can Minecraft register per second?
title: Click registration

replies.body: Lol wat, then why do people even bother jitter clicking? o_O
replies.body_tagged: Lol wat, then why do people even bother jitter clicking? o_O

replies.body: To my understanding, it registers 4 specific clicks at very precise times. If you click fast, you have a better chance of hitting those slots where the hit registers. Otherwise you would have to time it perfectly, which would be really hard to do
replies.body_tagged: To my understanding, it registers 4 specific clicks at very precise times. If you click fast, you have a better chance of hitting those slots where the hit registers. Otherwise you would have to time it perfectly, which would be really hard to do

replies.body: lol Can I change this value with a mod?

replies.body: The best I've seen is a plugin that can make it go up to 10, at most.
